preferred-tx-phy.help: Set the preferred TX PHY to configure at initialization of the BLE process. Note that some targets may not support all PHYs.

preferred-rx-phy.help: Set the preferred RX PHY to configure at initialization of the BLE process. Note that some targets may not support all PHYs.

enable-privacy.help: If set to true, LE privacy will be enabled and configured during initialization.
